text: 8.11: Kis 15.23; Jer 9.15; 23.15Mba kama zɨ khaŋ muuŋgi, Gɨrgɨr Mbatɨga Muuŋgi Ŋkirɨɨŋ ma.8.11 Ŋkirɨɨŋ, ana nza “Marasin” ga nzuai kameŋ ma. Ana nza Kirer Kaman “Marasin” ga rɨgi zɨ ma.  Ana rav mba phɨna mben ki phara regim, ana guigira gɨrgɨr mbatɨga muuŋgi ŋgirɨɨŋ fara muuŋgi. Gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve mba phara pim, mba phara mbe ndavi vheri tuim, mbe vhɨrve vhɨzi.
